Customer support

Manage My Booking

Manage My Bookings is a self-service tool that allows you in just a few clicks to amend, cancel, check the status of your booking(s), get a receipt, get a copy of your voucher and send special requests directly to hotels.

Manage My Booking

Email

  • You can find answers to most questions in Agoda’s FAQs.
  • For issues not covered by the FAQs or Manage My Bookings, please fill out the form in this page. We will usually reply within 24 hours. For urgent requests, please use the phone numbers provided on this page.
  • You can call us using the phone numbers provided on this page. International charges may apply. You'll need your Agoda Booking ID, which can be found on your confirmation voucher, and the last 4 digits of the credit card used to make your booking.
Required fields indicated with *.

Thank you for your form submittal.

Our Agoda Customer Support team will be in touch with you shortly.

Back

Call Us 24/7

You will need your Agoda Booking ID, which can be found on your confirmation voucher, and the last 4 digits of the credit card used to make your booking.
